languages.text: {n}Выбрав, на ваш взгляд, самые уязвимые места, вы прикрепляете взрывчатку и жмете триггер.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Выбрав, на ваш взгляд, самые уязвимые места, вы прикрепляете взрывчатку и жмете триггер.{/n}

languages.text: {n}After picking out what you think are the most vulnerable spots, you affix the explosives and push the trigger.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你在大门上找到了你认为最脆弱的位置，安放了炸药，之后按下了起爆器。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After picking out what you think are the most vulnerable spots, you affix the explosives and push the trigger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你在大门上找到了你认为最脆弱的位置，安放了炸药，之后按下了起爆器。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras localizar los puntos que crees que son más vulnerables, colocas los explosivos y activas el detonador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After picking out what you think are the most vulnerable spots, you affix the explosives and push the trigger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras localizar los puntos que crees que son más vulnerables, colocas los explosivos y activas el detonador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは最も弱いと思われるスポットを選んでから爆発物を設置し、トリガーを押した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After picking out what you think are the most vulnerable spots, you affix the explosives and push the trigger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは最も弱いと思われるスポットを選んでから爆発物を設置し、トリガーを押した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem du die deiner Meinung nach verwundbarsten Stellen ausgesucht hast, bringst du die Sprengsätze an und betätigst den Auslöser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After picking out what you think are the most vulnerable spots, you affix the explosives and push the trigger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem du die deiner Meinung nach verwundbarsten Stellen ausgesucht hast, bringst du die Sprengsätze an und betätigst den Auslöser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous sélectionnez ce qui vous semble être les points les plus vulnérables, posez les explosifs et les déclenchez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After picking out what you think are the most vulnerable spots, you affix the explosives and push the trigger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous sélectionnez ce qui vous semble être les points les plus vulnérables, posez les explosifs et les déclenchez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En kırılgan olduğunu düşündüğün noktaları seçtikten sonra patlayıcıları yerleştirip tetiğe basıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After picking out what you think are the most vulnerable spots, you affix the explosives and push the trigger.{/n}
